metadata.title: CVE-2021-29376 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ircII before 20210314 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault and client crash, disconnecting the victim from an IRC server) via a crafted CTCP UTC message.

criterions.comment: ircii package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
